text: Amor à Vida (Trail of Lies) is a Brazilian telenovela. It is produced by Rede Globo. It was Written by Walcyr Carrasco. It's stars include Paolla Oliveira, Mateus Solano and Juliano Cazarré. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2013 television series debuts Category:Brazilian telenovelas Category:2010s Brazilian television series Category:2010s establishments in Brazil
title: Amor à Vida
